channel.title: The Bukkit Project (Hogwarts, Spleef, Parkour and more!)
channel.description:
Welcome to the bukkit project's server information!
Things you can do: You can do many things in out server like... 1. visit our floating islands! (under construction) 2. visit hogwarts and get your degree in magic! (under construction) 3. play spleef! 4. do our GIANT parkour course... the tower of power! 5. go to 6 flags. (under construction) 6. Open a banking account 7. stay the night in a hotel 8. rent a home 9. compete in our mob arena! That is just some of the things that you can do in our server. --------------------------------------------------- Here are our plugins that benefit the players! (these are not our full list of plugins) 1. we use chest shop and iConomy for money and shops that you can actually buy from! 2. We have essentials so we can help protect your items, set homes, warp to places, and much more! 3. LWC Helps the players protect almost everything that they own. 4. Safe creeper, so you don't have to worry about creepers destroying everything you own, anymore! 5. Timber, so it is not that hard to get wood! 6. sign edit. Annoyed of having to constantly destroy lines just to edit 1 line? Well not anymore! sign edit allows you to edit your signs and color them! ---------------------------------------------------- Go to www.sandstormanimation to see pictures and read more! ---------------------------------------------------- SERVER IP BELOW: sandstormanimation.com ---------------------------------------------------- SERVER WEBSITE LINK BELOW: http://www.sandstormanimation.com

item.title: The Bukkit Project (Hogwarts, Spleef, Parkour and more!)
item.dc:creator: @sandstormanimation sandstormanimation
item.description:
@sandstormanimation wrote:

Welcome to the bukkit project’s server information!

Things you can do:
You can do many things in out server like…

  1. visit our floating islands! (under construction)
  2. visit hogwarts and get your degree in magic! (under construction)
  3. play spleef!
  4. do our GIANT parkour course… the tower of power!
  5. go to 6 flags. (under construction)
  6. Open a banking account
  7. stay the night in a hotel
  8. rent a home
  9. compete in our mob arena!
    That is just some of the things that you can do in our server.

Here are our plugins that benefit the players! (these are not our full list of plugins)

  1. we use chest shop and iConomy for money and shops that you can actually buy from!
  2. We have essentials so we can help protect your items, set homes, warp to places, and much more!
  3. LWC Helps the players protect almost everything that they own.
  4. Safe creeper, so you don’t have to worry about creepers destroying everything you own, anymore!
  5. Timber, so it is not that hard to get wood!
  6. sign edit. Annoyed of having to constantly destroy lines just to edit 1 line? Well not anymore! sign edit allows you to edit your signs and color them!

Go to www.sandstormanimation to see pictures and read more!

SERVER IP BELOW:
sandstormanimation.com

SERVER WEBSITE LINK BELOW:
http://www.sandstormanimation.com

Read full topic
